<properties pageTitle="a11ab962-6c5e-486d-8c68-359e2aac8e18" description="a86d5f3e-afd6-4687-9d93-401937d08ebc" services="service-bus" documentationCenter=".NET" authors="sethmanheim" manager="timlt" editor=""/>

MarkdownFencedCodeBlock.code_block: $sbr = Get-AzureSBAuthorizationRule -Namespace $Namespace # Create the NamespaceManager object to create the Event Hub Write-Output "Creating a NamespaceManager object for the [$Namespace] namespace..." $NamespaceManager = [Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager]::CreateFromConnectionString($sbr.ConnectionString); Write-Output "NamespaceManager object for the [$Namespace] namespace has been successfully created."

LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to create Service Bus queues, topics and subscriptions using a PowerShell script
